title: water_transfer_farm_to_mobile_tanks
summary: Water pumped from farm water tank to mobile water tanks for garden use.
description: Image records use of a submersible pump to transfer water from farm water tank WT-F-0001 (2000 L) to mobile water tanks WT-M-0001 to WT-M-0003 (200 L each) for vegetable garden operations.

external_reference.note: External image reference provided for independent verification.
